pkgmetadata.longdescription: General Purpose 'Oai-PMH' Services Client // A general purpose client to work with any 'OAI-PMH' (Open Archives Initiative Protocol for 'Metadata' Harvesting) service. The 'OAI-PMH' protocol is described at http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html. Functions are provided to work with the 'OAI-PMH' verbs: 'GetRecord', 'Identify', 'ListIdentifiers', 'ListMetadataFormats', 'ListRecords', and 'ListSets'.
